short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zoom in or zoom out of an image for better view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click at an image, choose the "image zoom" option from the menu brings up the zoom view. You can further zoom in/out of the image and drag the image to pan around. 

Version 0.0.2
* Added mouse wheel support (thanks for the suggestion)
* Added close image with Escape key
